text: Secret Mission () is a 1950 Soviet drama movie directed by Mikhail Romm.Смотри в оба: как произведения искусства снимаются в киноСекретная миссия (1950) It stars Nikolai Komissarov, Sergei Vecheslov, and Yelena Kuzmina. == Actors == * Nikolai Komissarov as Senator * Sergei Vecheslov as Gawrey * Yelena Kuzmina as Marta Shirke * Aleksey Gribov as General * Aleksandr Cheban as General == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1950 drama movies Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Movies directed by Mikhail Romm
title: Secret Mission (1950 movie)
